titleStmt.title: Mythological compendium with sayings of the seven sages

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Correct the |ed | tags of i.1 (vac.? should be [.?] throughout); dot final upsilon in i.1; add brackets to first four letters of i.4 and dot what follows; first three letters of i.5 in square brackets and dot Δί̣κ̣η̣ at end of line; first four letters of i.6 in square brackets; reverse the items in |reg| tags in i.6; print Νύμ̣φ̣[αι] at end of i.6; fix |ed| tags in i.7; add missing square brackets at end of i.7; εθφρα > ευφρα in i.8; correct final accent in i.8; add missing square brackets at start of i.7-9; fix the |ed| tags in i.9; add missing square brackets at start of i.11 and i.12; add [.?] at end of i.13 and check |ed| tags; transcribe i.14 and i.15; confirm |ed| tags and readings in what follows. META: make 65796 the ed.pr., P.Oxy. the previous edition; add 84725 as reference edition (pp. 340-345); add 15453 #66 as study; add 17428 pp. 17-19 as study; image link is (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH4481/8c78d529.dir/POxy.v0061.n4099.a.01.hires.jpg); the sept.sap. are tlg 1667; mp3 is 02451.040; add dimensions; Oxyrhynchus is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983)

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Correct the |ed | tags of i.1 (vac.? should be [.?] throughout); dot final upsilon in i.1; add brackets to first four letters of i.4 and dot what follows; first three letters of i.5 in square brackets and dot Δί̣κ̣η̣ at end of line; first four letters of i.6 in square brackets; reverse the items in |reg| tags in i.6; print Νύμ̣φ̣[αι] at end of i.6; fix |ed| tags in i.7; add missing square brackets at end of i.7; εθφρα > ευφρα in i.8; correct final accent in i.8; add missing square brackets at start of i.7-9; fix the |ed| tags in i.9; add missing square brackets at start of i.11 and i.12; add [.?] at end of i.13 and check |ed| tags; transcribe i.14 and i.15; confirm |ed| tags and readings in what follows. META: make 65796 the ed.pr., P.Oxy. the previous edition; add 84725 as reference edition (pp. 340-345); add 15453 #66 as study; add 17428 pp. 17-19 as study; image link is (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH4481/8c78d529.dir/POxy.v0061.n4099.a.01.hires.jpg); the sept.sap. are tlg 1667; mp3 is 02451.040; add dimensions; Oxyrhynchus is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983)
